raw: Czech markets, dog salons back in business as cautious reopening begins .

raw: PRAGUE ( Reuters ) - Farmers markets , craft shops , car dealerships and dog grooming salons opened in the Czech Republic on Monday , another step towards a return to normal life as the government grows more confident the coronavirus pandemic is under control .
replaced: PRAGUE ( Reuters ) - Farmers markets , craft shops , car dealerships and dog grooming salons opened in Czech Republic on Monday , another step towards a return to normal life as Czech Republic grows more confident the coronavirus pandemic is under control .

raw: Although strict hygiene rules are still in force such as requiring farmers to display produce two metres apart , the decision offered a glimmer of hope to small businesses hit hard by the lockdown .
replaced: Although strict hygiene rules are still in force such as requiring farmers to display produce two metres apart , the decision offered a glimmer of hope to small businesses hit hard by the lockdown .

raw: “ This is relief from the stress that we will have to throw away the harvest , ” said Milan Vystejn , a vegetable grower from the Melnik region north of Prague , at a stand in Prague ’s Tylovo Square .

raw: The central European country lifted restrictions after the coronavirus outbreak stabilised in the past week .

raw: Around 5,300 cases have been reported with 188 deaths , fewer than most west European countries .

raw: The Czech government moved quickly to impose some of Europe ’s strictest measures , closing schools and most borders , and shuttering restaurants and shops apart from food stores and pharmacies .
replaced: Czech Republic  moved quickly to impose some of Europe ’s strictest measures , closing schools and most borders , and shuttering restaurants and shops apart from food stores and pharmacies .

raw: While residents enjoyed being able to shop in more places , business groups eager to recharge the nation ’s economy called the moves cautious in comparison with countries like neighbouring Germany .
replaced: While residents enjoyed being able to shop in more places , business groups eager to recharge the nation ’s economy called moved cautious in comparison with countries like neighbouring Germany .

raw: The lobby group for retail trade , SOCR , said the government did not make clear what it based its reopening plan on or how future developments would alter it .

raw: “ I would for example understand a limit on the number of people rather than size of the store , ” SOCR chief Tomas Prouza told Reuters .

raw: Small shops of up to 200 square metres are to open next Monday followed by those up to 1,000 square metres and fitness centres on May 11 .
